<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Replay decision, if it has one</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Iter = InlineSitesFromRemarks.find(Combined);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Iter != InlineSitesFromRemarks.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Iter-&gt;second) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Replay Inliner: Inlined &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Callee &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; @ &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;unique&lt;DefaultInlineAdvice&gt;(</Highlight></CodeLine>
